item.title: RBI hikes key rate to 6.50% to tamp down sticky core inflation
item.description: Central banks typically raise the repo rate – the interest rate at which commercial banks borrow money by selling their securities to the Reserve Bank – to shrink money supply in the economy

content:encoded.p: Central banks typically raise the repo rate – the interest rate at which commercial banks borrow money by selling their securities to the Reserve Bank – to shrink money supply in the economy

item.title: Explained: What are monetary policy, repo rate and reverse repo rate?
item.description: It is the interest rate charged by the RBI when commercial banks borrow by selling their securities to the central bank. Basically, it is the interest charged by the RBI when banks borrow from it - much like commercial banks charge you interest for a car loan or home loan. The current repo rate is 6.25%.
item.itunes:title: Explained: What are monetary policy, repo rate and reverse repo rate?

content:encoded.p: It is the interest rate charged by the RBI when commercial banks borrow by selling their securities to the central bank. Basically, it is the interest charged by the RBI when banks borrow from it - much like commercial banks charge you interest for a car loan or home loan. The current repo rate is 6.25%.

item.title: Adani Group share clues can be seen in surging options market | Check the chart
item.description: Shares in flagship Adani Enterprises Ltd. have tumbled about 50% since Hindenburg published its short-selling report on Jan. 24, the steepest decline of the four stocks in the group that have underlying derivatives.
item.itunes:title: Adani Group share clues can be seen in surging options market | Check the chart

content:encoded.p: Shares in flagship Adani Enterprises Ltd. have tumbled about 50% since Hindenburg published its short-selling report on Jan. 24, the steepest decline of the four stocks in the group that have underlying derivatives.

item.title: Content, sports, smarter TVs and new features: What TV streaming trends tell us
item.description: Amazon’s latest streaming trends data pegs growing average daily viewership, over the web. Smart TV software and streaming apps must work in sync to curate and recommend relevant content

item.title: Adani’s UK units dropped Deloitte as auditor for small firms last year: Report
item.description: Crowe UK replaced the Big Four firm as the auditor of UK entities including Adani Energy Holdings Ltd. after the Indian firm bought them in 2021.

content:encoded.p: Crowe UK replaced the Big Four firm as the auditor of UK entities including Adani Energy Holdings Ltd. after the Indian firm bought them in 2021.

item.title: Adani founders to prepay loans worth $1.1 billion amid rout
item.description: The founders’ early payment will help release 11.77 million shares in Adani Transmission Ltd., the group said in a statement Monday.

item.title: Turkish currency slips to fresh record low after quake rips country
item.description: More than 500 people were killed and thousands injured on Monday, after a major earthquake of magnitude 7.8 struck central Turkey and northwest Syria.

item.title: Hindenburg row : NYU professor values Adani Enterprises stock at ₹945 per share. Here's why
item.description: Adani Enterprises Ltd. yielded a value of 945 rupees per share even before “factoring any of the Hindenburg accusations of fraud and malfeasance,” Aswath Damodaran wrote in a blog post.
item.itunes:title: Hindenburg row : NYU professor values Adani Enterprises stock at ₹945 per share. Here's why

content:encoded.p: Adani Enterprises Ltd. yielded a value of 945 rupees per share even before “factoring any of the Hindenburg accusations of fraud and malfeasance,” Aswath Damodaran wrote in a blog post.

item.title: Why Hindenburg Research decided to short only Adani stocks listed outside India
item.description: A trader who sold $1 million Adani Enterprises shares at the open on Feb. 1 and bought them back at the end of the day after the record plunge would have made about $280,000, excluding fees and transaction costs, according to Bloomberg.
item.itunes:title: Why Hindenburg Research decided to short only Adani stocks listed outside India

content:encoded.p: A trader who sold $1 million Adani Enterprises shares at the open on Feb. 1 and bought them back at the end of the day after the record plunge would have made about $280,000, excluding fees and transaction costs, according to Bloomberg.

item.title: It is time for Apple to evolve iPhone pricing, but what path will it choose?
item.description: There are three clear options. Just a price correction, keeping up with input costs. Or couple that with a serious specs and features upgrade. At the same time, a foldable iPhone surely isn’t out of consideration
item.itunes:title: It is time for Apple to evolve iPhone pricing, but what path will it choose?

content:encoded.p: There are three clear options. Just a price correction, keeping up with input costs. Or couple that with a serious specs and features upgrade. At the same time, a foldable iPhone surely isn’t out of consideration
